Toggle Menu

salt.runners.cache

Return cached data from minions

clear_all

Syntax

salt.runners.cache.clear_all(
								tgt=None,
								expr_form='glob'
								)

Details

Clear the cached pillar, grains, and mine data of the targeted minions

CLI Example:

salt-run cache.clear_all

clear_grains

Syntax

salt.runners.cache.clear_grains(
								tgt=None,
								expr_form='glob'
								)

Details

Clear the cached grains data of the targeted minions

CLI Example:

salt-run cache.clear_grains

clear_mine

Syntax

salt.runners.cache.clear_mine(
								tgt=None,
								expr_form='glob'
								)

Details

Clear the cached mine data of the targeted minions

CLI Example:

salt-run cache.clear_mine

clear_mine_func

Syntax

salt.runners.cache.clear_mine_func(
								tgt=None,
								expr_form='glob',
								clear_mine_func_flag=None
								)

Details

Clear the cached mine function data of the targeted minions

CLI Example:

salt-run cache.clear_mine_func tgt='*' clear_mine_func='network.interfaces'

Syntax

salt.runners.cache.clear_pillar(
								tgt=None,
								expr_form='glob'
								)

Details

Clear the cached pillar data of the targeted minions

CLI Example:

salt-run cache.clear_pillar

grains

Syntax

salt.runners.cache.grains(
								tgt=None,
								expr_form='glob',
								outputter=None,
								**kwargs
								)

Details

Return cached grains of the targeted minions

CLI Example:

salt-run cache.grains

Syntax

salt.runners.cache.mine(
								tgt=None,
